name: Oh! Kitsune-sama
overview: The protagonist of the game is a young boy who is about to graduate high school and is looking for a job to support himself during the upcoming college years. However, fate intervened and arranged a bike accident, which resulted in a meeting with a creature from another world - a cute fox-girl named Sharan. She needs nothing else but to be together with the hero; but a mysterious voice tells him: "one wish has been fulfilled, two more to go"... Oh! Kitsune-sama can be considered a visual novel. Though there are instances with the typical "Look/Talk/Think" interaction, it is very limited, there are no sub-menus with objects, every choice is context-related, and the game can be advanced simply by going through all the choices. There are scenes with explicit sexual situations in the game.
